com.rockhoppertech.music

Class Interval

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rockhoppertech.music.Interval

  • public class Interval
extends Object
    Utilities to convert between scale or chord spellings, intervals, degrees.
    Author:
    Gene De Lisa

      • getIntervalsFromSpelling

        public static int[] getIntervalsFromSpelling(String s)
        Degrees to intervals. e.g. Input 1 3 5 will give you 4,3
        Parameters:
        s - a chord spelling
        Returns:
        an array of intervals

      • getIntervalsFromString

        public static int[] getIntervalsFromString(String s)
        Relative intervals. Wraps integers in a string into an array Non specific. the input integers could be midinumbers, durations etc.
        Parameters:
        s - a string containing integers
        Returns:
        an array of the same integers

      • getAbsoluteIntervalsFromString

        public static int[] getAbsoluteIntervalsFromString(String s)
        Return intervals in relation to first int. Can be comma delimted or not. Non specific: can be ints, midinumbers etc.
        Parameters:
        s - a string that can be parsed into an int
        Returns:
        an int[] array of absolute intervals

      • getScaleSpelling

        public static String getScaleSpelling(int interval)
        Get the key from the map.
        Parameters:
        interval - an interval
        Returns:
        the spelling

      • getScaleSpelling

        public static int getScaleSpelling(String s)
        Parameters:
        s - a scale spelling
        Returns:
        the number of half steps in the spelling

      • getSpelling

        public static String getSpelling(int interval)
        Parameters:
        interval - an interval in half steps
        Returns:
        null or the chord spelling for an interval

      • getSpelling

        public static int getSpelling(String s)
        getSpelling("13") would yield the number of half steps in a thirteenth.
        Parameters:
        s - A chord spelling
        Returns:
        the number of half steps

      • intervalsToDegrees

        public static int[] intervalsToDegrees(int[] intervals)
        Turn intervals into Scale degrees.
        Parameters:
        intervals - the intervals to turn into degrees
        Returns:
        an array of degrees
        See Also:
        Scale

      • intervalsToDegrees

        public static int[] intervalsToDegrees(int[] intervals,
                       int nOctaves)
        Can turn the intervals in a scale into their scale degrees. You can generate patterns.
        Parameters:
        intervals - an array of intervals
        nOctaves - how many octaves to use
        Returns:
        an array of degrees
        See Also:
        ScaleFactory.getNoteListPattern(Scale, int[], int, int, int, double, boolean, double, boolean)

        public static String spell(int[] intervals)

        Spell a chord.

        Parameters:
        intervals - an array of intervals
        Returns:
        a chord spelling

        public static String spellScale(int[] intervals)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
